details: Learned the process for creating a printed circuit board (PCB)
Performed risk analysis for PCB lamination failures
Presented analysis and solutions to reduce lamination failures
Designed tools and oversaw production of the favored solution
Designed experiment procedures for determining insect wing properties
Operated Edgertronic high-speed camera and tensile tester
Analyzed displacement results to obtain elastic properties of moth wings
Thesis: Toward a Universal Framework for Mapping Human Motion to Morphologically Diverse Robots
Created research proposals to further ventures
Applied machine learning expertise beyond robotics, including energy and material science
